title: bAramma ele
sahitya:
bAramma ele muddu gOpyamma


anupallavi

  nimma bAlakrSNayyage buddhi hELamma bAlakaranu 
baDEvanamma muddu nIla varNage buddhi hELamma


caraNam 1    saNNavanAgi tOruvanamma pAl beNNe mosaru kadivanamma 
kaNNAre kaNDavu maga nimma muddu ciNNage buddhiya pELamma
    caraNam 2    iTTa kastUri nAmadavamma ava hoTTeyoLiDa ballanI jagavamma 
duSTa hAvanu tuLidavanamma gOpi gaTyAgi buddhiya pELamma
    caraNam 3    araLele mAgAyiyavanamma honna beraLa rannada mudrikeyavanamma 
iruLu hagalu namma maruLu mADi pOda taraLage buddhiya pELamma
    caraNam 4    mAyA rUpili baruvanamma kaddu Avina mEle umbuvanamma 
mAvana kondanivanamma celva dEvara dEvage buddhi pELamma
    caraNam 5    kaDahada maranEridavanamma beTTa koDE mADi hiDidu kAidavanamma 
maDadErandadi ramisuvanamma ghuDu ghuDisi kambadaloDevanamma
    caraNam 6    ommege Ivari kolidavanamma celva brahma dEvara paDedavanamma 
nammelara poreva purandara viTTalage ghammane buddhiya pELamma
